title: BBC Local Live: Norfolk on Wednesday, 25 November 2015 - BBC News
summary: two people are arrested in london in connection with a killing in great yarmouth .
the advertising standards authority has upheld complaints against a theme park 's poster for a halloween event .
news , sport , weather and travel updates resume at 08:00 on thursday .

documents.title: our live coverage today
text: that 's all from the norfolk live team for today .
we 'll be back tomorrow from 08:00 with more live news , sport , weather and travel updates for the county .

documents.title: headlines : funding for enterprise zones granted
text: the main news stories this evening :

documents.title: ndr gets go ahead from chancellor
text: work on the northern distributor road in norwich will get underway before christmas after the chancellor confirmed the amount of national funding going into the project in his autumn statement .

county council leader george nobbs says he 's `` delighted '' george osborne has approved the release of £ 77.49m over three years towards the construction of the road from the postwick junction to the a140 .
the whole project , including the postwick hub is expected to cost around £ 179m with funding coming from department of transport , new anglia lep and norfolk councils .
author: Mariam Issimdar
BBC Norfolk Live

documents.title: gurney clock goes into storage while new home sought
text: it took 12 years to build , but now one of norfolk 's most iconic time pieces is being dismantled and put into storage .
the gurney clock was gifted to the people of norwich almost 40 years ago , to celebrate 200 years of the local gurney 's bank in norwich - now barclays .
but the site in castle mall , where the clock has stood for the last 12 years , is being redeveloped and for now it has no new home .
author: Mariam Issimdar
BBC Norfolk Live

documents.title: weather : odd shower possible and feeling cold
text: a few isolated showers for northern and eastern parts of norfolk with the odd heavier downpour with hail possible .
elsewhere dry with clear spells , so a chilly start to the night .
weather has your local forecast .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: stars decorate puppets for charity auction
text: rick stein and john hurt are just some of the people who 've decorated puppets which will be auctioned tonight to raise money for norwich puppet theatre .
look east 's stewart white is compering the event - and you can even bid for puppet versions of him and susie fowler watt .
all of the proceeds will go towards supporting the creation and development of new shows .

documents.title: ban 'black friday ' says norfolk shop worker 's union official
text: a union official from norfolk wants 'black friday ' sales banned saying they put shop workers at risk .
it follows violent scenes in supermarkets last year as people fought over supposed bargains .
stuart sharman of usdaw says the american tradition where stores slash prices the day after thanksgiving is an `` abomination '' .

documents.title: bus company investigating after bus crashes into a bridge
text: bus operator first says it 's investigating how one of its buses ended up hitting a railway bridge near acle .
no-one was hurt , but it led to greater anglia suspending train services between norwich and great yarmouth for a while .
the bus was operating as a rail replacement for the 08:45 great yarmouth to norwich service which had been cancelled due to a train fault .

documents.title: government spending review creates new business zones
text: the government 's spending review has revealed funding to create and extend four enterprise zones in norfolk .
norwich research park , nar ouse business park in king 's lynn , as well as scottow at the old raf coltishall base , and egmere business zone , south of wells next-the-sea , are the named zones .
funding has also been made available to extend the existing great yarmouth and lowestoft zone .
author: Mariam Issimdar
BBC Norfolk Live

documents.title: cannabis factory found in norwich raid
text: norfolk police say they have seized a large haul of cannabis plants during a raid in norwich .
more than 250 plants were found after officers were tipped off about sus behaviour in the north park avenue area .
police say the raid will `` put a large dent in the cannabis industry in norwich '' .

documents.title: funding for ivf treatment in south norfolk to cease
text: funding for ivf courses for people living in south norfolk is to cease from january .

the south norfolk clinical commissioning group ( ccg ) made the decision following a public consultation , but said people undergoing treatment making them infertile , for cancer or hiv , would receive ivf help if they met the eligibility criteria .
the ccg , which will end the year with a deficit of about £ 6.6m , says it is `` facing a significant financial challenge '' .
author: Mariam Issimdar
BBC Norfolk Live

documents.title: wasp sting causes cardiac arrest and closes a47
text: a man who went into cardiac arrest after being stung by a wasp while driving on the a47 near wisbech is in a critical condition .
he was taken to the queen elizabeth hospital in king 's lynn by air ambulance .
the road , which was closed , has now re-opened .
author: Mariam Issimdar
BBC Norfolk Live

documents.title: norwich south mp told to 'take up yoga ' by commons speaker
text: norwich south labour mp clive lewis has been told to `` take up yoga '' and that it would do him good by the speaker of the house of commons after heckling george osborne a touch too noisily .
john bercow delivered the mild rebuke to mr lewis during the chancellor 's spending review speech to parliament today .
mr lewis immediately posted a jokey tweet saying : `` anyone know a good yoga course ? ''
anyone know a good yoga course ?
# autumnstatement
@ twitterid @ twitterid i like rodney yee 's 50 minute aerobic yoga !
this has saved my body and mind .
@ twitterid @ twitterid that a dvd , class or a soundcloud recording ?
@ twitterid @ twitterid hello yes , it 's a dvd !
i just did it right now and feeling great !
@ twitterid i am a kundalini yoga teacher in peckham and camberwell - feel free to come to one of my classes when in london !
@ twitterid @ twitterid if you 're not angry , you 're not paying attention.keep being angry .
@ twitterid @ twitterid # should use his own advice take his wife to yoga
@ twitterid perhaps george o has done yoga with that massive u-turn
@ twitterid you are amazing !
right now happy to have best of the bunch as my mp - thank you for speaking up .
no yoga necessary ; ) x
@ twitterid check out there are some great courses on offer : )
@ twitterid i teach in norwich and london check out
@ twitterid keep telling it like it is clive , someone has to give the poor a voice in parliament .
@ twitterid only saw quick clip on bbc news site .
what got you so shouty ?
@ twitterid why not try it !
suggest @ twitterid - excellent teacher
@ twitterid buddhist centre in attleborough if that helps !
the people of norwich south appreciate your passion even if the speaker does n't
@ twitterid lol clive , can recommend meditation , but do n't get too calm , they need a good rousting .
@ twitterid norfolkmindfulness courses starting in january
@ twitterid the web address
@ twitterid spiral therapies at whitlingham .
clare is amazing .
she has a website .
@ twitterid give @ twitterid a look
author: Nic Rigby
BBC News

documents.title: food outlets in norwich score highly for hygiene
text: more than 80 % of food businesses in norwich , including restaurants , takeaways and pubs , have achieved a four- or five-star rating from the food standards agency for hygiene .
the ratings are decided by local authority food safety officers .
the snapshot survey of 1,301 establishments in the city was carried out this month .

documents.title: weather : sunny spells with showers possible along the coast
text: plenty of sunny spells with the odd heavy shower along the coasts .
top temperature reaching 9c ( 48f ) .
weather has more details .
author: Kate Kinsella
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: public warned of new banking scam in hemsby and caister
text: policein the great yarmouth area are warning people not to be taken in by a new banking scam involving a phone call from a man claiming to be an officer from scotland yard .
giving a fake name and number , he asks the victims to to meet him at a cash machine , take out all their money , and hand it over for safe-keeping .
no money has been handed over yet and in one of the cases a neighbour intervened to prevent this from taking place .
author: Mariam Issimdar
BBC Norfolk Live

documents.title: mother 'vindicated ' after advertising watchdog says poster was 'menacing '
text: mother-of-three johannah martin , from rackheath , faced a backlash on facebook when she complained about a poster advertising a halloween fright night , urging others to do the same .
but now the advertising standards authority has upheld 23 complaints , adding lenwade dinosaur park must never use it again and it was `` irresponsibly targeted '' .
`` i 'm really glad an external body that sees that kind of imagery all the time has agreed with me . ''
author: Mariam Issimdar
BBC Norfolk Live

documents.title: news headlines : advertising watchdog says halloween poster `` menacing '' police warn of a new banking scam in hemsby and caister
text: the main news stories this lunchtime :
author: Mariam Issimdar
BBC Norfolk Live

documents.title: services suspended after bus hits railway bridge
text: services were suspended for a short while this morning after a replacement bus for greater anglia hit a bridge in acle at about 08:45 .
james bradbury tweeted this photo .
author: Mariam Issimdar
BBC Norfolk Live

documents.title: bus gets stuck under bridge in acle
text: this image was tweeted by james bradbury , whose journey from acle station to norwich was delayed after a replacement bus for a greater anglia train took the wrong turn , getting stuck under a bridge in acle .
author: Mariam Issimdar
BBC Norfolk Live

documents.title: abellio greater anglia : more replacement buses this weekend
text: services affected between norwich and liverpool :
sun from 21:40 - replacement buses for some norwich-liverpool st/norwich-ipswich services kb

documents.title: wells lifeboat to be funded by off-shore company
text: an offshore wind firm is funding wells lifeboat for the next two years .
dong energy is putting 90 turbines on the race bank , 17 miles north of blakeney .
it will give £ 20,000 towards the boat 's running costs .

documents.title: award for city college hotel takeover project
text: city college norwich 's hotel school and the holiday inn norwich north are celebrating after their hotel takeover initiative scooped the education pipeline award
author: Just Regional

documents.title: young city stars need to be patient
text: here is today 's norwich evening news back page :
author: Norwich Evening News

documents.title: city boss admits his frustration
text: here is today 's edp back page :
author: Eastern Daily Press

documents.title: helping our elderly this winter
text: here is today 's norwich evening news front page :
author: Norwich Evening News

documents.title: government asked to extend phone mast funding deadline
text: a councillor hoping for better mobile phone communications in the blakeney area says she will be lobbying the government to keep funding for the project .
the company arqiva was hoping to install a mast on national trust land but withdrew its plans after objections delayed the process so much that it missed government funding opportunity .
does n't mean i wo n't be asking , but it would be a minor miracle for that particular budget to still be sustained . ''
author: Mariam Issimdar
BBC Norfolk Live

documents.title: blakeney phone mast pulled
text: a planned phone mast for blakeney wo n't now be built after the company behind the application , arqiva , pulled out because it could n't install the mast in time to qualify for government funding .
there had been some opposition to the 30m ( 98ft ) mast being installed .

documents.title: growing ambition : uea vision for 20 % increase in student numbers
text: here is today 's edp front page :
author: Eastern Daily Press

documents.title: theme park apologises after watchdog criticises halloween clown advert
text: the owner of the dinosaur adventure park in lenwade has apologised after the advertising standards authority upheld complaints about a bloodied clown featured on posters for its primeval halloween attraction .
the asa said the posters , some of which were outside shops near schools , were `` irresponsibly targeted '' .
as a halloween attraction we will be devising a poster which we will be putting forward to the asa before they go out . ''
author: Mariam Issimdar
BBC Norfolk Live

documents.title: high tides pass with no damage
text: high tides along norfolk 's coastline this morning have passed with no reports of damage .
in wells , water lapped gently at the edge of the car park and further down the coast at hemsby ( tide did n't even come in as far as the sea defences being put in .
the concrete blocks are being paid for by the local community which two years ago lost five homes to the december storm surge .
author: Andrew Turner
BBC Radio Norfolk

documents.title: city boss neil admits to changing his attacking philosophy
text: shareholders had the opportunity to speak directly with norwich city 's manager and board last night at the club 's annual general meeting .
author: Phil Daley
BBC Radio Norfolk sport

documents.title: advertising watchdog upholds complaints about halloween poster
text: a dinosaur theme park has been told to tone down its halloween marketing by the advertsing standards authority after it upheld 23 complaints against a poster .
the park at lenwade was told the poster of a bloodied clown on display near schools was likely to distress children and was `` irresponsibly targeted '' .
author: Mariam Issimdar
BBC Norfolk Live

documents.title: more murder arrests over flat death
text: two men have been arrested on sus of murdering a man at a flat in great yarmouth .
andrew mcgowan was found with serious injuries after police were called to reports of a disturbance on 14 november at a flat off dickens avenue .
another man and a woman arrested earlier this month remain on bail .
author: David Keller
BBC News

documents.title: travel : a47 north burlingham partially blocked with delays
text: the a47 at the b1140 south walsham road in north burlingham is partially blocked and there are delays eastbound following an accident .
travel has more updates .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: weather : windy with spells of sunshine
text: any showers will clear before some brighter spells of sunshine take hold .
staying breezy with temperatures reaching 9c ( 48f ) .
weather has your local forecast .
author: Kate Kinsella
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: welcome to bbc norfolk live
text: hello and good morning .
the team are here to bring you all the county 's latest news , sport , weather and travel throughout the day until 18:00 .
if you have a story for us , or a to share please send it viaemail , twitterorfacebook .
author: Mariam Issimdar
BBC Norfolk Live
